sourcesContent:

export const categories = [
  { id: 'all', name: 'All Apps', count: ecosystemApps.length },
  { id: 'defi', name: 'DeFi', count: ecosystemApps.filter(app => app.category === 'DeFi').length },
  { id: 'trading', name: 'Trading', count: ecosystemApps.filter(app => app.category === 'Trading').length },
  { id: 'lending', name: 'Lending', count: ecosystemApps.filter(app => app.category === 'Lending').length },
  { id: 'prediction-markets', name: 'Prediction Markets', count: ecosystemApps.filter(app => app.category === 'Prediction Markets').length },
  { id: 'gaming', name: 'Gaming', count: ecosystemApps.filter(app => app.category === 'Gaming').length },
  { id: 'wallets', name: 'Wallets', count: 0 },
  { id: 'infrastructure', name: 'Infrastructure', count: 0 },
  { id: 'analytics', name: 'Analytics', count: 0 },
  { id: 'ai', name: 'AI', count: 0 },
  { id: 'nft-fi', name: 'NFT-Fi', count: 0 },
  { id: 'identity', name: 'Identity', count: 0 },
  { id: 'dev-tooling', name: 'Dev Tooling', count: 0 }
];

// Simulate fetching from API
export const fetchEcosystemApps = async () => {
  // Simulate API delay
  await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000));
  return ecosystemApps;
};
